name: Yin & Yang in search of Harmony
name_original: Yin & Yang in search of Harmony
description:
A short story of Yin & Yang on a mission to save harmony in the world. It was broken apart in pieces but they are still connected together...

Highlights:

* I am 41 and a father of three, a successful Executive in IT industry. And this is the second completed game I finished! Thank you Brackeys!

* Simple appealing story of Yin and Yang striving to restore harmony in the world.

* Original soundtrack - my second (first) hobby is music. I literally wrote the theme in the last hour before deadline. There are some rough edges but overall it seem to be fitting the topic perfectly creating an atmosphere of loss and hope. 

* Elegant monochrome (black & white actually) aesthetics.

* Game was made for Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam which had a theme "Stronger Together. Yin and Yang are indeed stronger together, moreover they are literally tied together and you control them at once. 

Hope you enjoy the story, aesthetics and game. I am looking forward for your feedback. 

Andrey "Createev"
